text:
Hi Drew 
Hope you good, and you been probably very busy. I just want to ask you few question as well for my assignment. We have to ask
To our mentor 8 questions and do a presentation about him/her , i hope you would find the time to answer at some one them :)

1- What was your aspiration before get to the industry? 
2 - what was your plan to get into the industry, if you didn’t have it, where did you study and get knowledges about lighting and compositing before get into the industry ? 
3 - what is your most satisfied work in your career? 
4 - how balanced is an VFX artist lifestyle? 
5 - Do you think that VFX gonna be better or worst in like 5 years From today ? 
6 - what’s your favourite film? Why? 
7 - Do you had a mentor or someone that inspired you particularly?
8 - one thing that is essential for be a compositor ? 

Thanks a lot for the time 

Hope you the best 

See you soon
